name: link_parsed
description: Triggered when a deep link or a QR code is successfully parsed.

params.name: params
params.description: The parameters extracted from the parsed link.

name: deeplink_received
description: Triggered when a deep link is received.

name: iap_purchase
description: Triggered when an in-app purchase is initiated.

params.name: product_id
params.description: The identifier of the purchased product.

name: iap_upgrade
description: Triggered when an in-app purchase upgrade is initiated.

params.name: old_product_id
params.description: The identifier of the product being upgraded.

params.name: new_product_id
params.description: The identifier of the new product.

name: iap_purchase_failed
description: Triggered when an in-app purchase fails.

params.name: product_id
params.description: The identifier of the product that failed to purchase.

params.name: failure_reason
params.description: The reason for the failure.

name: iap_purchase_complete
description: Triggered when an in-app purchase is completed successfully.

params.name: product_id
params.description: The identifier of the purchased product.

name: iap_cancelled
description: Triggered when an in-app purchase is cancelled by the user.

params.name: product_id
params.description: The identifier of the cancelled product.

name: iap_expired
description: Triggered when an in-app purchase subscription expires.

params.name: product_id
params.description: The identifier of the expired product.

name: login_failed
description: Triggered when a login attempt fails.

params.name: login_type
params.description: The type of login attempted (e.g. email, openID, uniSSO).

name: forgot_password_recovery_sent
description: Triggered when a password recovery email is sent.

name: forgot_password_recovery_failed
description: Triggered when a password recovery attempt fails.

name: sign_up_failed
description: Triggered when a sign-up attempt fails.

params.name: login_type
params.description: The type of login attempted (e.g. email, openID, uniSSO).

name: launcher_section_change
description: Triggered when the user navigates to a different section of the launcher.

params.name: section
params.description: The name of the new section. (feed/explore/progress/library)

name: popup_closed
description: Triggered when any popup is closed.

params.name: popup_name
params.description: The name of the popup that was closed.

name: popup_opened
description: Triggered when any popup is opened.

params.name: popup_name
params.description: The name of the popup that was opened.

name: qr_code_scanned
description: Triggered when a QR code is successfully scanned.

name: qr_code_unknown
description: Triggered when a QR code scan is unrecognized.

name: feed_resume_button_clicked
description: Triggered when the feed resume button (floating over the feed) is clicked.

name: daily_activity_limit_reached
description: Triggered when the daily activity play limit is reached.

name: library_tab_change
description: Triggered when the user switches tabs in the library.

params.name: new_tab
params.description: The name of the new tab. (completed/revision/saved)

name: display_name_changed
description: Triggered when a user changes their display name.

params.name: new_display_name
params.description: The new display name.

name: academic_area_changed
description: Triggered when a user changes their academic area.

params.name: new_area
params.description: The new academic area.

name: ability_set
description: Triggered when a user sets their ability level.

params.name: new_ability
params.description: The new ability level.

name: activity_ranking_set
description: Triggered when a user sets their activity ranking preference.

params.name: new_activity_ranking
params.description: The new activity ranking.

name: language_set
description: Triggered when a user changes their language setting.

params.name: new_language
params.description: The new language ID.

name: year_set
description: Triggered when a user sets their academic year.

params.name: new_year
params.description: The new academic year.

name: avatar_set
description: Triggered when a user changes their avatar.

params.name: new_avatar
params.description: The new avatar.

name: skin_tone_set
description: Triggered when a user changes their skin tone.

params.name: new_skin_tone
params.description: The new skin tone.

name: hair_colour_set
description: Triggered when a user changes their hair color.

params.name: new_hair_colour
params.description: The new hair color.

name: sign_out
description: Triggered when a user signs out of the application.

name: facebook_login_button_pressed
description: Triggered when the Facebook login button is pressed.

name: feed_threshold_changed
description: Triggered when a user changes the feed completion threshold.

params.name: threshold
params.description: The new feed threshold value. (between 0 and 1)

name: topic_selection_changed
description: Triggered when a user changes their topic selection.

params.name: topics
params.description: The new selected topics. (List of GUIDs)

name: theme_changed
description: Triggered when a user changes the application theme.

params.name: theme
params.description: The new theme ID.

name: sfx_changed
description: Triggered when a user toggles sound effects.

params.name: enabled
params.description: Indicates whether sound effects are enabled.

name: saved_activity_added
description: Triggered when a saved activity is added.

params.name: activity
params.description: The activity that was added.

name: saved_activity_removed
description: Triggered when a saved activity is removed.

params.name: activity
params.description: The activity that was removed.
